name: Poison Point
summary: If the user is hit by a contact move, there is a 30% chance the opponent will be poisoned.
viability: While badly poisoned is arguable better than regular poisoned, Poison Point is still a decent ability. Especially with the Roselia line, being able to inflict the poison status on another Pokémon, then use the very powerful Venoshock should serve some great purpose. Otherwise, it's a bit luck-based, so use at your own discretion.
